MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. Altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and simple business plan calculators for everyone.
At Dynamic Applications, we are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain. We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. We work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer:
21st century Truck Driver comes with the full-featured Formula Editor of Perfect Desire, our professional business model development environment.
DLROW-III-MODEL
On Startup it shows a Promo Code field to activate all features. Codes are posted in the Dynamic Idea and Roadmap competition.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: v5.87 - new SDUI MessageBox with decent, fine dark design. v5.84 - decent mouse-over preview of dynamic qs, our 2021 public voting. v5.76 - smooth Time Ruler with integrated painting of Date and Time functionality. v5.64 - dna License Bug Bountry Programme with specific 1000 Euro starter bonus.

Press_Release.Press_Release:
Dynamic Applications releases 21st century Truck Driver, a true King of the Road simulation.
Drive.
The 21st century Truck driver is the Dynamic Application of choice for Truck drivers. It transfers the famous King of the Road feeling right into 21st century, digital native age.
In 21st century, the traditional Truck driver is soon not going to be needed anymore. In response, this Truck driver sells his House, buys his Truck, makes Windows, paints, moves in, and drives on. In a realistic scenario, this simulation model calculations the number of days to drive before you sleep.
At Dynamic Applications, we work to empower people. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.

Press_Release.Headline: Dynamic Applications releases 21st century Truck Driver, a true King of the Road simulation.
Press_Release.Summary: Dynamic Applications releases 21st century Truck Driver simulation. The king of the Road buys his Truck, Sells his house, buys Diesel, and drives on.
Press_Release.Keywords: Truck, driver, 21st century, Truck driver, Road, Car, Auto, Diesel, km, hours, miles, infinity

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: The 21st century Truck Driver comes with a creative commons, cc-by-sa inspired license. It's free to share.

English.Keywords: 21st century, Truck driver, Truck, Road, Car, Auto, Diesel, Startup, dynamicons, Dynamic Applications
English.Char_Desc_45: Sell your House, buy your Truck, drive on.
English.Char_Desc_80: The 21st century Truck driver sells his house, buys old Truck, and drives on.
English.Char_Desc_250: The 21st century Truck driver sells his house, buys old Truck, makes Windows, paints, moves in, and drives on. This Dynamic Application calculates how much Diesel you can buy for the price of your House, and how many miles to go before you sleep.
English.Char_Desc_450: The 21st century Truck driver is the Dynamic Application of choice for Truck drivers. He's the King of the Road. One day, he comes back to his home base, tired and dull from hourless driving on 20th century's highways. Parking the Truck, his boss comes by and says: Hey, you, Truck driver! - we got automated Trucks now. Our Truck driver sells his house, buys old Truck, makes Windows, paints, moves in, and drives on. Calculate how far he can go.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
The 21st century Truck driver is the Dynamic Application of choice for the king of the road.
One day, our Truck Driver comes back to his home base, tired and dull from hourless driving on 20th century's highways. Parking the Truck, his boss comes by and says: Hey, you, Truck driver! - we got automated Trucks now. The 21st century Truck driver sells his house, buys his old Truck, makes Windows, paints, moves in, and drives on. Who cares about business anyway? - he's the king of the road. We calculate how far he can go.
includes:
Dynamic Idea and Roadmap competition The Bakery Model, our introductory Startup cost-profit Tutorial. a Multi-Material Product calculator. a freely configurable Time Ruler. and the 21st century Truck Driver simulation.
At Dynamic Applications, we work to empower people. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.
